qualitative.reasoning: Management has delivered exceptional growth (10x revenue in 8 years) and successfully diversified into high-growth verticals like EVs. Although promoter holding decreased by ~5.3% via block deals and dilution from a recent QIP, the stake was absorbed by reputable institutional investors (Singapore Govt, Motilal Oswal), signaling confidence. The QIP funds (₹1,500 Cr) are earmarked for capacity expansion and debt reduction, aligning with their aggressive 35-40% revenue growth guidance.
